system.description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that every creature within 60 feet of a symbol of weakness instead suffers crippling weakness that deals 3d6 points of Strength damage. No hit point limit; once triggered, remains active for 10 minutes per caster level. A rogue can use Search (DC 32) and Disable Device (DC 32) to find and thwart it.

components.materialDescription: Mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal with a total value of at least 5,000 gp.

system.target: One symbol drawn on a surface
